pr_title: Fix #1898: Fix failure in Deserialization for AdmissionRequest class

timeline.bodyText:
I know this file was copy pasted and modified from code generation, but it really looks messy with empty comments and partial javadoc.
Is it possible to clean this up a little?
Also use diamond operator where appropriate, etc.
timeline.author: manusa

timeline.message:
Fix #1898: Fix failure in Deserialization for AdmissionRequest class

CreateOptions, DeleteOptions, UpdateOptions, PatchOptions are implementing KubernetesResource
But in all rawExtensions types are mapped to HasMetadata. I had to override the default
generated class in order to get parsing to work.
